description: Velvety, lightweight suede gives this flight-inspired jacket a luxurious Polo upgrade.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 26½" front body length, a 25½" back body length, a 19" shoulder, a 46½" chest, and a 35½" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes 1" between sizes.
Ribbed baseball collar. Full-zip placket with a leather zipper pull.
Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Ventilating metal grommets at the underarms.
Two front waist snapped pockets. Interior left chest pocket.
Metal "Polo" plaque at the back neck.
Shell: leather. Body lining: cotton. Sleeve lining: polyester, viscose. Collar, cuffs, and hem: cotton, wool.
